column5: Villa North Star is walking distance to North Star Mall & other shopping centers and restaurants. We are 5 minutes from the airport and walking distance to public transportation. We are also 15 minutes from the convention Center & Medical Center. Consist of two full size bedrooms,each with queen size beds,one full bath and about 1000 Sq feet of private living area. We've done our best to make you feel like it's your home away from home. This place is good for couples,business travelers.
